      • getMaxParticipants

        public int getMaxParticipants()
                       throws JoynServiceException
        Returns the max number of participants in the group chat. This limit is read during the conference event subscription and overrides the provisioning parameter.
        Returns:
        Number
        Throws:
        JoynServiceException

      • quitConversation

        public void quitConversation()
                      throws JoynServiceException
        Quits a group chat conversation. The conversation will continue between other participants if there are enough participants.
        Throws:
        JoynServiceException
